1.0.3.name: wordpress/dc-x-simple-gallery
1.0.3.description: DC-X simple gallery is a Wordpress plugin to pull and display content from the DC-X content management system. You'll need a DC-X username and password and also an URL to your DC-X server to use this plugin. Read more about DC-X at Digicol or the company who built this plugin, Teknograd. This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.
